meanings.sent1: The whizzbangs of the fireworks startled the dog.
meanings.sent2: The thunder made a loud whizzbangs in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The whizzbangs of the car backfiring made everyone jump.
meanings.sent4: The whizzbangs of the storm echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected whizzbangs of the balloon popping scared the children.

meanings.definition: A type of firework that makes a loud noise
meanings.sent1: The colorful whizzbangs lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent2: We watched the whizzbangs explode in celebration.
meanings.sent3: The whizzbangs at the fireworks show were dazzling.
meanings.sent4: The whizzbangs soared high before bursting into light.
meanings.sent5: The whizzbangs at the party amazed the guests.

meanings.definition: Something that is very impressive or exciting
meanings.sent1: The magician's tricks were real whizzbangs for the audience.
meanings.sent2: The new movie is full of exciting whizzbangs.
meanings.sent3: The whizzbangs of the surprise party left her speechless.
meanings.sent4: The whizzbangs of the grand finale brought the crowd to their feet.
meanings.sent5: The whizzbangs of the roller coaster ride thrilled the kids.
